sentences.en: ‘Pass the salt, please…thanks.’
sentences.cn: “请把盐递过来…谢谢。”

sentences.en: "Dinner's ready." — "Thanks, Carrie, but we'll have a drink first."
sentences.cn: “饭好啦。”——“谢谢，卡丽，不过我们想先来一杯。”

sentences.en: "Goodbye, then, and thanks. Good luck."— 'The same to you.'
sentences.cn: “那么，再见，谢谢。祝你好运。”——“也祝你好运。”

sentences.en: "It's great to see you."— 'Thanks. Same to you.'
sentences.cn: “看见你很高兴。”——“谢谢，我也是。”

sentences.en: "Thanks friend," he said, while sweeping the money into his pocket.
sentences.cn: “谢了，朋友，”他说着就把钱划拉进了口袋。

sentences.en: "That's a nice dress," said Michael. "Thanks," she replied solemnly.
sentences.cn: “那件衣服很好看，”迈克尔说。“谢谢，”她严肃地回答。

sentences.en: “our national good fortune in having avoided, thanks to the religion clauses of the First Amendment, the dismal possibilities of religious censorship”(&b{Benno C. Schmidt, Jr.})
sentences.cn: “我们国家的已避免的好运，是由于第一修正案中的宗教条款，排除了宗教的可能性”(&b{小本诺C.施米特})

sentences.en: finally found the house, no thanks to these confusing directions.
sentences.cn: 最后找到了房子，并不受益于这些混乱的指点

sentences.en: He grunted his thanks.
sentences.cn: 他嘟哝着道了谢。

sentences.en: He has written a note asking me to pass on his thanks.
sentences.cn: 他写了张便条让我转达他的谢意。

sentences.en: I have given thanks to God for delivering me from that pain.
sentences.cn: 我感谢上帝把我从那种痛苦中拯救出来。

sentences.en: I would like to express my warmest thanks to the doctors.
sentences.cn: 我想向医生们表达我最由衷的感谢。

sentences.en: I would like to propose a vote of thanks to our host.
sentences.cn: 我提议对我们的主人表示感谢。

sentences.en: Joe got up and left without a word of thanks .
sentences.cn: 乔起身离开了，一句感谢的话也没有说。

sentences.en: Kemp got out of his car. "Just fill her up, thanks."
sentences.cn: 肯普下了车。“给它加满油，谢谢。”

sentences.en: Many thanks for the lovely flowers.
sentences.cn: 花很漂亮，非常感谢。

sentences.en: She smiled her thanks and arranged the guitar under her arm.
sentences.cn: 她微笑着致了谢，把胳膊下面的吉他调整了一下。

sentences.en: Thanks a lot, Suzie. You've been great.
sentences.cn: 多谢了，苏兹。你太好了。

sentences.en: Thanks for your point of view, John.
sentences.cn: 约翰，感谢你发表见解。

sentences.en: Thanks to a new EU directive, insecticide labelling will be more specific.
sentences.cn: 根据欧盟的一项新指令，杀虫剂的标签标注将更加明确。

sentences.en: Thanks very much for your help.
sentences.cn: 非常感谢你的帮助。

trans.tran_en: used to tell someone that you are grateful for something they have given you or done for you
used to tell someone that you are grateful for something they have given you or done for you

trans.tran_cn: 感谢，谢谢，感谢，谢谢，道谢的话( thank的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: the things you say or do to show that you are grateful to someone

trans.tran_cn: 谢谢，感谢( thank的第三人称单数 )，责怪
